TraitDef.label: Bosmer Forest Wisdom
TraitDef.description: This Bosmer possesses the natural archery skills and forest knowledge of the Wood Elves of Valenwood.

li.label: Green Pact
li.description: Born in the forests of Valenwood, this pawn has exceptional archery skills and plant knowledge.

TraitDef.label: Altmer Magical Affinity
TraitDef.description: This Altmer possesses the enhanced magical abilities and intellectual superiority of the High Elves of Summerset.

li.label: Highborn
li.description: Born with the magical superiority of the Summerset Isles, this pawn excels in intellectual and artistic pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Orsimer Ferocity
TraitDef.description: This Orsimer possesses the natural strength and smithing abilities of the Orc strongholds.

li.label: Berserker Rage
li.description: Born with the fierce strength of the Orsimer, this pawn excels in combat and metalworking.

TraitDef.label: Dwemer Ingenuity
TraitDef.description: This Dwemer possesses the advanced technological knowledge and engineering skills of the Deep Elves.

li.label: Master Engineer
li.description: Born with the technological mastery of the Dwemer, this pawn excels in crafting, construction, and intellectual pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Snow Elf Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Falmer possesses the ancient heritage of the Snow Elves, with natural cold resistance, archery skills, and magical affinity.

li.label: Ancient Legacy
li.description: Born with the proud heritage of the original Snow Elves, this pawn excels in archery, magic, and construction of their great cities.

TraitDef.label: Ayleid Starlight Mastery
TraitDef.description: This Ayleid possesses the ancient magical knowledge and architectural mastery of the Wild Elves.

li.label: Starlight Magic
li.description: Born with mastery of ancient magics and architecture, this pawn excels in intellectual and artistic pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Chimer Warrior Spirit
TraitDef.description: This Chimer possesses the warrior culture and Daedric devotion of the ancestor folk.

li.label: Ancestor Blessing
li.description: Born with the warrior spirit of the Chimer, this pawn excels in combat and shows strong devotion.

TraitDef.label: Maormer Sea Mastery
TraitDef.description: This Maormer possesses the seafaring skills and serpent-charming abilities of the Sea Elves.

li.label: Serpent Lord
li.description: Born with mastery of the seas and serpents, this pawn excels in animals, shooting, and shows natural adaptability.

TraitDef.label: Aldmer Ancient Wisdom
TraitDef.description: This Aldmer possesses the ancient wisdom and pure magical heritage of the first elves.

li.label: First Born
li.description: Born with the pure essence of the first elves, this pawn has exceptional abilities in all intellectual and magical pursuits.
